root.message: The IMPUTATION field for indicator 8-10-1, translated into en
root.data:
• At country level

Missing values are registered as empty. “n/a” are used when the country indicates that those services or institutions do not exist in the country, or alternatively, do not fall under the supervisory scope of a regulatory agency.

  • At regional and global levels

“n/a” are used when the country indicates that those services or institutions do not exist in the country, or alternatively, do not fall under the supervisory scope of a regulatory agency. Trend extrapolation is used for countries that have not reported for 2019.
